text: Johan Hendrik "Hans" Grosheide (6 August 1930 â€“ 18 December 2022) was a Dutch politician. Grosheide worked as a teacher and education administrator for Protestant Reformed special schools from November 1954, until September 1963. After the election of 1963 Grosheide was appointed as State Secretary for Education, Arts and Sciences, taking office on 3 September 1963, until the cabinet formation of 1965. He was State Secretary for Education and Sciences, taking office on 14 April 1965. ==Other websites== * Mr. J.H. title: Hans Grosheide
